channel.title: Hey I need help please on 2 problems
channel.description:
How dose one create spawns? Sorry I sorta forgot because I haven't been coding for almost a year and a half and also, how do you make it so then if you use ::char then once you log out and in, it saves?
Thanks.

item.title: Hey I need help please on 2 problems
item.dc:creator: @Master_Monk Master Monk
item.description:
@Master_Monk wrote:

spawn = Npc ID	xCoord	YCoord	0	0	0	0	Height

Thats the default one for a npc.
